52.movie_plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

98.movie_plot: A man joins the political campaign of a smooth-operator candidate for president of the USA.

25.movie_plot: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and asks her to drive him from Wisconsin to Arizona. The government tries to stop them.

156.movie_plot: A married soldier returning from World War II poses as a pregnant woman's husband to save her from her father's anger and honor.

19.movie_plot: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

93.movie_plot: A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.

51.movie_plot: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected - but which one?

3.movie_plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazi Germans.

127.movie_plot: A group of 12 teenagers from various backgrounds enroll at the American Ballet Academy in New York to make it as ballet dancers and each one deals with the problems and stress of training and getting ahead in the world of dance.

95.movie_plot: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

21.movie_plot: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.

134.movie_plot: A British soldier kidnapped by IRA terrorists soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.

108.movie_plot: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

124.movie_plot: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend--both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

54.movie_plot: In suburban New Canaan, Connecticut, 1973, middle class families experimenting with casual sex and substance abuse find their lives beyond their control.

101.movie_plot: A college dropout, attempting to win back his father's high standards he gets a job as a broker for a suburban investment firm, which puts him on the fast track to success, but the job might not be as legitimate as it once appeared to be.

159.movie_plot: In New Jersey in 1935, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.

32.movie_plot: Norman is a curmudgeon with an estranged relationship with his daughter Chelsea. At Golden Pond, he and his wife nevertheless agree to care for Billy, the son of Chelsea's new boyfriend, and a most unexpected relationship blooms.

89.movie_plot: Rudy has always been told that he was too small to play college football. But he is determined to overcome the odds and fulfill his dream of playing for Notre Dame.

71.movie_plot: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

116.movie_plot: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation; it turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

166.movie_plot: The story of the original Mercury 7 astronauts and their macho, seat-of-the-pants approach to the space program.
